tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BusinessIntelligenceReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bi_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_description TEXT,
  create_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  source_type VARCHAR(50),
  connection_string TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE report_data (
  report_id INT,
  data_source_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  total_records INT
)

CREATE TABLE business_intelligence (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE big_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    source VARCHAR(100),
    size DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date_collected DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_date DATE,
    analyst VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE metrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(100),
    metric_type VARCHAR(50),
    value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE business_intelligence_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    report_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE big_data_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_analysts (
    analyst_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(255),
    analyst_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    analyst_department VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE report_executions (
    execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT REFERENCES business_intelligence_reports(report_id),
    execution_date DATETIME,
    execution_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT REFERENCES big_data_sources(source_id),
    analyst_id INT REFERENCES data_analysts(analyst_id),
    usage_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT
)
